name: The Orville Space Shooter
description:
Space Shooter based off the TV Science Fiction show, The Orville, from FOX.

This is a fan game, it is free to play and share. Enjoy

The stream example video stutters in places - it's the mouse cursor leaving the game screen,  sorry  - but, its not the game stuttering, it's the controller going away momentarily.

Updates are planned!

Please email any problems, such as it's free we're all testers.
